body:
It is the most popular tool for assessing applied problem-solving skills in the programming languages. Coding is the process of creating software, and our platform offers you the flexibility to create questions that require candidates to write real working code and not just pseudocode. 

Here is a list of some of the salient features: 

  • Creating a general algorithm-based coding question automatically evaluated based on the test cases.
  • Supports more than 35 programming languages
  • Code playback option is available.
  • Viewing the code quality of the submitted code.

Refer to the below articles for creating and scoring a coding question: 

  1. Creating a coding question
  2. Scoring a coding question
